text: Hydnocarpus octandrus is a species of plant in the Achariaceae family, but originally placed in the Flacourtiaceae family by Arthur Cronquist. It is endemic to Sri Lanka. ==In culture== Known as "wal divul" in Sinhala ==References== octandra Category:Vulnerable plants Category:Endemic flora of Sri Lanka Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Hydnocarpus octandra
